冏.definition: velvetleaf (Abutilon avicennae), plant of the jute family; bright

冏卿.definition: minister of the imperial stud, originally charged with horse breeding

冏寺.definition: same as 太僕寺|太仆寺[Tai4 pu2 si4], Court of imperial stud, office originally charged with horse breeding

冏徹.definition: bright and easily understood; clear; transparent

冏牧.definition: minister of the imperial stud, originally charged with horse breeding
